### Cell type Markers {.tabset}


```{r, results ='asis', echo = FALSE}
for(i in seq_along(ps$genes)){
  cat('\n#### ', names(ps$genes)[i], '\n')
  print(ps$genes[i])
  cat('\n')
}
```
